title: Error 404 on Reports Page
description: User encounters a 404 error when trying to open the monthly reports section.

title: VPN Connection Drops Frequently
description: VPN disconnects every 10-15 minutes, affecting work from home access.

title: Unexpected Logout from App
description: App logs out randomly without any action by the user.

title: Missing Language Options
description: Settings page does not show all available languages for selection.

title: Slow File Upload
description: Files larger than 10MB take several minutes to upload or fail midway.

title: Push Notifications Not Showing
description: User reports no push notifications appear for new messages on Android device.

title: Incorrect Tax Calculation
description: Invoices show incorrect tax amount for international orders.

title: Profile Theme Reset
description: User custom theme settings reset after app update.

title: Chat Messages Delayed
description: Messages in the chat module are delayed by several minutes before delivery.

title: Dashboard Widgets Not Loading
description: Some dashboard widgets fail to load and display a spinning loader endlessly.

title: Account Locked After Multiple Logins
description: User account gets locked after several login attempts from different devices.

title: Incorrect Order Quantity
description: Orders show wrong quantity in invoice compared to what was ordered.

title: App Dark Mode Glitch
description: Dark mode theme switches back to light mode randomly during usage.

title: Unexpected Data Deletion
description: Some entries in the database disappeared without user action.

title: Login Captcha Not Loading
description: Captcha image does not appear on login screen for new users.
